casebody.data:
EASTWAY WRECKER SERVICE
v.
CHARLOTTE. No. 467A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 27, 2005. T. LaFontaine Odom, Sr., Thomas L. Odom, Jr., for Eastway Wrecker Service. S. Jujeeb Shah-Kahn, Assistant City Attorney, for City of Charlotte.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of July 2005 by Defendant to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of July 2005."
